creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription:
Etched in hoarding panel at right:  Joseph Pennell, this curiosity has been secured at enormous expense.  He eats copper;
Etched in plate at L.R.:  The Last of the Scaffolding drawn during removal  April 1884
signed: In pencil in lower margin:  Joseph Pennell
title: The Last of the Scaffolding, Philadelphia
